guides.title: SOC Analyst Career Roadmap: From Tier 1 to Security Architect (2026)
guides.excerpt: Complete SOC analyst career roadmap. Tier 1-3 progression, required skills, certifications with ROI analysis (Security+, CySA+, GSOC), salary benchmarks ($55K-$160K+), and hands-on lab exercises.

guides.title: CEH vs OSCP: The Definitive Certification Comparison (2026)
guides.excerpt: Data-driven CEH vs OSCP comparison. Exam formats, difficulty (60-70% vs 30-40% pass rate), salary impact (+$8K vs +$25K), total costs, and a decision framework for your career stage.

guides.title: Securing the AI-Powered IDE: Hardening VS Code, Cursor & Windsurf
guides.excerpt: Research-grade hardening guide for VS Code and AI editors (Cursor/Windsurf). Prevent 2026 supply chain attacks with auditing scripts, strict extension policies, and .cursorignore isolation.

guides.title: Clawdbot/Moltbot Security: Critical Risks & Complete Hardening Guide
guides.excerpt: The viral AI assistant with 30K+ stars has hundreds of exposed instances. Learn what Clawdbot/Moltbot is, its security risks (root access, prompt injection, supply chain), and how to secure it.

guides.title: AI Crawler Security: The Hidden Data Leak Risk Nobody Talks About
guides.excerpt: AI crawlers like ClaudeBot and GPTBot scrape your site for training. Learn the hidden security risks: data leakage, reconnaissance, PII exposure - plus complete blocking guide.

guides.title: MEDUSA Security Scanner: AI-First SAST with 180+ AI Rules
guides.excerpt: Complete guide to MEDUSA, the AI-first SAST tool with 74 scanners and 180+ AI agent security rules. OWASP LLM Top 10 2025 coverage, CI/CD integration, and IDE setup.

guides.title: Securing Autonomous AI Agents: The 2026 Architecture Guide
guides.excerpt: Enterprise security architecture for AI agents. Permission scoping, HITL enforcement, sandboxing, and defense strategies for LangChain, AutoGPT, and custom frameworks.

guides.title: Kubernetes AI Security: Protecting the ML Pipeline
guides.excerpt: Enterprise hardening for GPU clusters, model registries, and MLOps infrastructure. Serialization attack defense and container security for AI workloads.

guides.title: Deepfake Defense: Technical Detection of Synthetic Identities
guides.excerpt: Forensic techniques for detecting AI-generated audio, video, and images. Audio spectral analysis, facial landmark detection, and SOC workflows.

guides.title: 2026 Compliance Checklist: DORA, EU AI Act & NIST Mastery

guides.title: Advanced Unicode LLM Attacks: Variation Selectors & Token Exploitation
guides.excerpt: Expert-level guide to Unicode-based LLM attacks. Variation selector exploits, imperceptible jailbreaks, ASCII smuggling (CVE-2025-32711), and enterprise defense architectures.

guides.title: Unicode Smuggling: How Hackers Hide Instructions in Emojis
guides.excerpt: Discover how attackers hide jailbreak instructions inside emojis and invisible Unicode characters. Learn zero-width attacks, emoji exploits, and defense strategies.

guides.title: Digital Forensics Fundamentals

guides.title: DevSecOps Pipeline Security
